question:
Consider the following statements about the YAWS Disease:
  1. It is a tropical infection of the skin, bones and joints caused by the spirochete bacterium
  2. India has been recently declared YAWS Free by WHO
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Yaws is a chronic infection that affects mainly the skin, bone and cartilage. About 75% of people affected are children under 15 years of age (peak incidence occurs in children aged 6-10 years). India is the first country under the 2012 WHO neglected tropical diseases (NTD) roadmap to eliminate yaws.
